positions.title: AE
positions.description: Owns the full sales cycle: prospecting, booking, and managing freight. Develops customer relationships, negotiates rates, and coordinates with carriers. Revenue generators measured by gross profit, load count, and retention.

positions.title: SSR
positions.description: Provides operational and administrative support to Sales Executives. Handles rate confirmations, paperwork, carrier updates, and ensures smooth load execution.

positions.title: CSR
positions.description: Manages customer service operations. Tracks shipments, communicates with carriers and clients, resolves issues, and ensures timely updates.

positions.title: BDR
positions.description: Business Development Representative focused on identifying new shippers, generating qualified leads, and supporting market expansion.
